import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; export class FoodUploader extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ platillo:'', ingredientes:[''], picante:'', precio: Number, restaurante:'', imgPlatillo:'', descripcion:'' } } onSubmitForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('https://tamales-server.herokuapp.com/create/food',this.state) .then(res => alert('Platillo añadido')) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } onInputChange = (e) =>{ const {id,value} = e.target; this.setState({ [id]:value }) } render() { return (
) } } export default FoodUploader
